reviewText: I really love my lateral thigh trainer but when the VHS workout tape that came with it crapped out I ordered another online to replace it. It is okay but I really wish they sold this in DVD - VHS is so outdated and they do not last very long when you use it every day...
I love this video.  I have had my thigh trainer for about 10 years and this advanced video for the trainer is fantastic.  I am really excited with this new workout.  I would order from you again.

This machine and video combination is a great way to lose weight in a small amount of time, It is especially good for us women who have had children and have that bothersome pouch in the stomach area, boy oh boy does this machine work, results are seen (whole body)in two weeks, a leaner face is seen within one week .

Oh boy if u add the sweat suit(the one u normally run in) u really see results,  the sweat suit will drop off a large amount of water from the cuff at the stomach area, (the suit cuffs your body-stomach to keep in the heat)this is a result of all the sweat u let off during your workout.

This machine is definitely a good one to invest in, make sure u purchase a few tapes for uninterruptted usage over the years.
